sub_concepts.name: Scale
sub_concepts.definition: The relationship between the distance on a map and the corresponding distance in reality.

sub_concepts.name: Projection
sub_concepts.definition: A method used to transfer the Earth's surface onto a flat sheet of paper or a computer screen.

sub_concepts.name: Contour line
sub_concepts.definition: Imaginary lines that connect points of equal elevation on a terrain.

sub_concepts.name: Topography
sub_concepts.definition: The study of the shape and features of the Earth's surface.

sub_concepts.name: Cartography
sub_concepts.definition: The art and science of creating maps.

sub_concepts.name: Map symbols
sub_concepts.definition: Symbols used to represent different features on a map, such as roads, buildings, and vegetation.

sub_concepts.name: Legend
sub_concepts.definition: A key or explanation of the symbols used on a map.
